alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:11AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Some strong thunderstorm will impact parts of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin through 10 AM... At 906 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking some strong thunderstorms moving through southern Allamakee and eastern Clayton counties in northeast Iowa and southern Crawford, southwestern Richland and Grant counties in southwest Wisconsin. These storms are moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, rainfall totals in the excess of 1 inch an hour, and maybe some small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lancaster around 920 AM CDT. Dickeyville around 950 AM CDT. Cuba City and Hazel Green around 1000 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
